title: Say hi to our new empoyee!
content: We're excited to welcome Runbot as a new member of the Runwell team.

title: Say hi to our newest team member -Runbot!
content: We're thrilled to introduce Runbot, the latest addition to the Runwell team!

While he may not need coffee breaks or team lunches, Runbot is here to make our workflows smoother and our days a little easier. Built to support our operations and automate the boring stuff, he's already hard at work behind the scenes.
